thread.section_title: VoidHawk Flashlights Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of VoidHawk Flashlights | www.voidhawkflashlights.com
thread.title: Stacy Etgen
thread.title_full: VoidHawk Flashlights reviewed by Stacy Etgen

author: Stacy Etgen
title: Stacy Etgen
text: Extremely fast shipper, the quality of the flashlight is actually more than I expected. The ultra wide field of view, it actually makes you feel like its daylight. You can see everything so clearly. And the spot beam, is so bright, you can see everything too. You can see a cat at 100 yards. The rechargeable batteries is the main reason I bought it and it sure saves on batteries in the long run, and very convenient and easy to charge. Love the product.
